author: brycem
body: These dockerfiles use the same Dockerfile ARGs as the Linux counterparts and will need to be touched when new releases become available.  Later we can add SHA265 verification or MSI installation logic for ServerCore if it is desired

@brycem PRs should be sent out from a fork instead of from a branch directly pushed to powershell/powershell. That is to make sure powershell/powershell has a minimal number of branches. 
Are there any special reasons that you need to work in a branch under PS/PS? If not, could you please close this PR and re-send it from a fork?
